short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify the rate of plants in the market.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds the rate of plants and mother tree for the Plant VS Undead NFT game.
The so called rate is the LE / hour ratio. 
In this way its easy to understand the value of the plant.

0.2 Added LE Ration for Account and Farm
0.1 Added LE Ratio for Marketplace
